transcript:
Hello madam.
Customer: Haan ji madam, aaiye.
Executive: Sir abhi main link bheju aapko?
Customer: Haan. Kis mein bhejte ho? Whatsapp? Link nahi toh text message.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan, link kaise bhejte hain madam?
Executive: Sir main aapko link bhej rahi hoon whatsapp pe, aap join kariye.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Haan, main aapko link bhej rahi hoon whatsapp pe, theek hai?
Customer: Okay, okay.
Executive: Haan, join kariye aap.
Customer: Hmm.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer asks how the link will be sent.



Resolution:

- Executive will send the link via WhatsApp.



Next Steps: 

- Issue resolved.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

whatsapp link
